authors: Daniel D., John B., Shawn Abreu, John D. updated and combined by Sebouh K.
instructions:
Contact Sebouh K. at skuwed @ gmail . com (without the spaces) for any question or bug reports. Black Crusade Advanced API is an API enabled character sheet for pro subscription gamemasters.

It requires:
* The [Degrees of Success javascripts](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/Dark%20Heresy%20Advanced%202nd%20Edition/API%20Scripts) written by Jack D
* The [Ammo Count Api Script](https://github.com/shdwjk/Roll20API/blob/master/Ammo/Ammo.js) by Aaron C. Meadow
